name: reject-pdu
description: Represents a BACnet Reject PDU, used to reject a confirmed service request and indicate the reason for rejection.

fields.name: pdu-type
fields.description: The type of the protocol data unit (PDU).

fields.name: original-invoke-id
fields.description: The invoke ID of the original request being rejected.

fields.name: reject-reason
fields.description: The reason for rejecting the request.
